sqls.sql: SELECT sr_dlv_h_id, sn_no, sn_type, sn_type_name, invp_no, invp_name, sr_dlv_sn_rmk1, sr_dlv_sn_rmk2, sr_dlv_sn_rmk3, sr_dlv_sn_rmk4, sr_dlv_sn_rmk5, sr_dlv_sn_rmk6, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM sr_dlv_sn WHERE sr_dlv_sn_id = @sr_dlv_sn_id;
